fields.name: igs_id
fields.description: A unique identifier that combines sequence data and metadata. This identifier is used as part of the FASTA ID in the sequence data.

fields.name: date_of_sampling
fields.description: Date of sampling in ISO 8601 format without time zone

fields.name: sequencing_platform
fields.description: The sequencing platform used based on the ontology approved by ENA

fields.name: sequencing_reason
fields.description: Reason for conducting the sequencing. `random`: The sample was taken randomly.`requested`: The sample was taken due to concerns/suspicions about a new variant or something similar. `clinical`: The sample comes from a clinical setting. `other`: The reason is none of the above.

fields.name: lab_sequence_id
fields.description: FASTA ID used by the laboratory in encrypted form

fields.name: date_of_submission
fields.description: Date of receipt of the genome at the RKI in ISO 8601 format without time zone

fields.name: version
fields.description: Version of the sequence starting with 0

fields.name: prime_diagnostic_lab.demis_lab_id
fields.description: Identification number of the primary diagnostic laboratory

fields.name: prime_diagnostic_lab.postal_code
fields.description: Postal code of the primary diagnostic laboratory

fields.name: sequencing_lab.demis_lab_id
fields.description: Identification number of the sequencing laboratory

fields.name: sequencing_lab.postal_code
fields.description: Postal code of the sequencing lab

fields.name: genome.gtrs
fields.description: genomic typing results (GTR) in JSON format
